name: Errol L. Lloyd
content: Errol's Home Page Errol L. Lloyd Professor Emeritus Computer and Information Sciences College of Engineering University of Delaware 101 Smith Hall Newark, DE 19716 elloyd at udel.edu Professor Lloyd has retired. He is not taking any new students, postdocs, visitors or assignments!
